description:
STOP ✋🛑 COMPLYING WITH ANYONE WHO TRIES TO CONTROL YOUR REALITY (THOUGHTS, FEELINGS, IDEAS, WHAT TO EAT, HOW TO THINK, HOW TO ACT, WHAT IS ""LEGAL"" AND WHAT ISN'T. THESE ARE JUST RULES ANOTHER HUMAN HAVE MADE. WE ALL HAVE THE REAL DIVINE RULES WITHIN US AND YOU DO NOT NEED TO FOLLOW ANYONE BUT THEM IF YOU DONT FOLLOW YOUR OWN RULES THEN YOUR BODY, MIND AND SOUL ARE MOST LIKELY INFECTED BY EVIL AKA LIVE BACKWARDS (LIVING BACKWARDS)
🔆
ITS TIME FOR YOU TO MAKE YOUR OWN RULES! YOUR OWN TRUTH , YOUR OWN PATH, YOUR OWN REALITY😎
🔆
The spiritual journey is INDIVIDUAL, highly PERSONAL, it can't be organized or regulated. it isn't true that everyone should follow one path. LISTEN to your OWN Truth.
🔆
You as the individual have the power.
We are the revolution 😈
🔆
Staying healthy in these times 👇
Most important is keeping yourself active,healthy and natural food, Sunlight, meditation, daily grounding DO NOT STRESS 🤓
(stress creates all sorts of problems and illnesses) breath deep💯
🔆
POWERFUL NUTRITION 🏺🗿
🔸Shilajit(85 +minerals and fulvic acid)
